input.sentences: a trip to the petting zoo for the family ! the kids love the animals !
it 's time to feed the animals . this little lady has a handful of food pellets !
after visiting and feeding so many animals | it 's time for a break in the shade !
a healthy afternoon snack of delicious apples really hit the spot !
the last stop of the day in our petting zoo trip . this spotted fellow is chowing down on his meal !
output.sentences: The child is looking on the animals at the petting zoo, she looks scared.
After she's done with the animals she stops at a nearby sink to wash her hands.
The family sits at relaxes for a minute in the hot sun.
The kids keep cool with some healthy snacks.
Then they go to visit some more animals, starting with the giraffes.
